actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Credit and Rural Electrification

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to stabilize the commodity prices received by farmers and provide credit assistance to farmers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Emergency Farm Stabilization Act of 1982 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture for FY 1982 to: (1) disseminate the $600,000,000 authorized for economic emergency loans; (2) and forego Farmers Home Administration loan foreclosures for two years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to stabilize the commodity prices received by farmers and provide credit assistance to farmers, and for other purposes.
